steps.step_description: Preheat oven to 400 degrees and prepare baking dish by spraying bottom with olive oil.

Lay Chicken on cutting board and cover with plastic wrap.  Use rolling pin or meat pounder to flatten out chicken.  This is by far my favorite step of the recipe and is a great way to end a stressful day.
Take 1-2 Tbsp of boursin cheese and spread across chicken.  Layer spinach leave on top of cheese.
If desired lay out bacon slices on top of spinach layer.
Gently folder over chicken to close opening.  Take two pieces of baking twine to tie close (one on each end)
Place in baking dish and season with salt and pepper.  Bake for 45 minutes.
